Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/90th
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and Halsted due to street blockage near Halsted/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/90th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Forest Park-bound Blue Line Trains
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays and congestion near UIC/Halsted. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays and congestion near UIC/Halsted.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
